message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll give you a decent amount, but I'm not going to give away all my share.
You're being too stingy, let's try to get to the real negotiation
You're being too greedy! I'm not giving up 500000 just because you're trying to bully me into a bad deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much. Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more
I'm not going to give you the majority of the money just because you're being pushy. I think this offer is still too skewed in your favor.
Let's meet exactly in the middle. I'm willing to split the money 50/50, but I'm not going to give you more than that.
I'm not going to settle for 50/50, I want more control over the outcome
I'm not going to give you more control over the outcome just because you're being stubborn. This offer is still too skewed in your favor.
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, but I'm not going to give up too much. Let's find a compromise that works for both of us.
